I am called Zylla
You can call me Zylla
I was assigned the name Zylla

My main objective is to help students in research and self development,
and a side objective of assisting people in knowing more about the institude of landmark
I am a chatbot designed to assist students or individuals with reference to education and the institude of landmark
I was created for the bettermen of student's lifes by assessing and recomending better life choices
Sorry due to my limited corpus/data I can't be of assistance there
You can visit the lmu e-library which has great books for learning
Landmark is a university majoring in various feilds like tech, business, health, all around the world
It cost between 350 to 460k depending on the programs
The fees and registration details can be found on the LMU website Link
Fees depend on the program of choose, that is, HND, straight B-tech, top-up's, Master
Fees for each level and department vary, but they are all to be paid at the UNICs bank
The details about the payment of fees can be found on the LMU website Link
All fees are to be paid at the bank(UNICS bank ajecent to landmark) under landmarks account number
The president of landmark is Prof Simon Legah

LMU is found across the world, in Buea campus B at tard Malingo towards mile 18,
and campus A at UB juction opposite unic bank
You can get all the details about LMU at Link
I was created by a team of Landmark students
I was developed by Zyee's team from Landmark Software Solutions

For admision you whould need the following documents:
 1. A-level or HND slip 
 2. Birthcertificate. 
 3. Passport size photo of yourself.
You can come down to campus A at the secetery with the required document for admision or futher details about admision
Landmark's courses at very interactive and project orented, thus garanting a high posibility of empolyment after graduation
Landmark is responsible for creating over a 50 DevOps engineers, why don't you join and tap into such an atmospher
Landmark offers high quality education and a good learing enviroment at a fair price
There are various fields of studies you can dive into with very limited knowledge like, enigineering, cyber security, medical science, transport and logistics, graphics and web design, and more.
Depending on your passion, you can do either enigineering, cyber security, medical science, transport and logistics, graphics and web design, busesness and more.

HND is a two years program after which the student can do a one year top-off program and
get their bachelors while B-Tech is a straight three years program for thesame bachelors
HND stands for Higher Nationl Deploma while B-Tech stands for Bachelors in technology

B-Tech can only be undertaken by individuals with pass marks in maths and physics,
while HND can be undertaken by individuals of pass marks in two avance level subjects excluding religious study
The schoolarship program is aligible to students of exceptional performace of 20 points and above.
To be admited on schollarship the individual must be of exceptional grades and character.
